original_text: Asa then took the silver and gold out of the treasuries of the Lord’s temple and of his own palace and sent it to Ben-Hadad king of Aram, who was ruling in Damascus.
korean_text: 아사가 여호와의 전 곳간과 왕궁 곳간의 은금을 내어다가 다메섹에 사는 아람 왕 벤하닷에게 보내며 이르되

sentences.original_text: Asa then took the silver and gold
sentences.korean_translation: 아사는 그 때에 은과 금을 가져왔고

sentences.original_text: out of the treasuries of the Lord's temple
and sent it to Ben-Hadad king of Aram
